obfuscation: ﻿ The `` real life '' soap opera A few years back a fresh kind of program appeared in Swedish television .
original: ﻿ The "real life" soap opera  A few years back a new kind of program appeared in Swedish television.

obfuscation: At first there were massive criticism against the platform .
original: At first there were massive criticism against the program.

obfuscation: This was because of the fact that one participant in the program was voted out of the program in each episode .
original: This was because of the fact that one participant in the program was voted out of the program in each episode.

obfuscation: The other participants of the plan made the outvoting and this was at first seen as offensive towards the person being outvoted .
original: The other participants of the program made the outvoting and this was at first seen as offensive towards the person being outvoted.

obfuscation: The criticism soon vanished and the platform became very successful .
original: The criticism soon vanished and the program became very successful.

obfuscation: The plan I am talking about is `` Expedition Robinson '' which has been shown four times in Swedish public service television .
original: The program I am talking about is "Expedition Robinson" which has been shown four times in Swedish public service television.

obfuscation: Expedition Robinson is a program that can be classified as being a part of the fresh genre of documentary soap operas .
original: Expedition Robinson is a program that can be classified as being a part of the new genre of documentary soap operas.

obfuscation: In the last year Robinson , as the plan usually is called , has been joined by several other programs in this documentary soap genre .
original: In the last year Robinson, as the program usually is called, has been joined by several other programs in this documentary soap genre.

obfuscation: Examples of programs are `` Baren '' , `` Villa Medusa '' and `` Radio '' .
original: Examples of programs are "Baren", "Villa Medusa" and "Radio".

obfuscation: These documentary soap operas are my subject in this essay .
original: These documentary soap operas are my subject in this essay.

obfuscation: I 'm going to focus on unlike aspects of these kind of programs , namely who watch these programs - how does it affect them and also the very name documentary , is it really a documentary ?
original: I'm going to focus on different aspects of these kind of programs, namely who watch these programs - how does it affect them and also the very name documentary, is it really a documentary?

obfuscation: I like to watch Robinson but I do n't like the early programs that classify themselves as documentary soap operas .
original: I like to watch Robinson but I don't like the other programs that classify themselves as documentary soap operas.

obfuscation: Maybe it is n't correct to classify Robinson as a documentary soap I would rather call it a pure entertainment program .
original: Maybe it isn't right to classify Robinson as a documentary soap I would rather call it a pure entertainment program.

obfuscation: If we put the labeling of the programs aside it can clearly be seen that today 's fresh documentary soaps have been inspired by `` Expedition Robinson '' .
original: If we put the labeling of the programs aside it can clearly be seen that today's new documentary soaps have been inspired by "Expedition Robinson".

obfuscation: They all have the like concepts with people applying in to be a part of the program and the fact that some sort of out voting and contests are performed .
original: They all have the same concepts with people applying in to be a part of the program and the fact that some sort of out voting and contests are performed.

obfuscation: The thing that differ the programs is where they take place and what they do , it can be on an island or in a villa in the Alps .
original: The thing that differ the programs is where they take place and what they do, it can be on an island or in a villa in the Alps.

obfuscation: Now over to the question who watch these programs and how does it affect them ?
original: Now over to the question who watch these programs and how does it affect them?

obfuscation: I have been giving this some thought and I have formulated another question that I will try to answer .
original: I have been giving this some thought and I have formulated another question that I will try to answer.

obfuscation: Is it entirely stupid people who watch these programs or do these programs make people stupid ?
original: Is it only stupid people who watch these programs or do these programs make people stupid?

obfuscation: Or is this totally wrong ?
original: Or is this totally wrong?

obfuscation: The reason that I ask this question is that I watched a part of the first episode of `` Villa Medusa '' and the one thing that struck me was that all the participants in the program acted idiotically .
original: The reason that I ask this question is that I watched a part of the first episode of "Villa Medusa" and the one thing that struck me was that all the participants in the program acted idiotically.

obfuscation: I did n't watch long enough to really find out if they were total idiots or if they merely acted a bit silly in the beginning .
original: I didn't watch long enough to really find out if they were total idiots or if they just acted a bit silly in the beginning.

obfuscation: I hope it is the latter one , but I 'm not sure .
original: I hope it is the latter one, but I'm not sure.

obfuscation: The only answer I get to the questions that I asked before is that I probably am right in the last question .
original: The only answer I have to the questions that I asked before is that I probably am right in the last question.

obfuscation: It ' s totally wrong .
original: It' s totally wrong.

obfuscation: It 's not potential to label a person as stupid just based on what he or she watches on television .
original: It's not possible to label a person as stupid just based on what he or she watches on television.

obfuscation: The second thing I do n't like about these kinds of programs is that they are labeled as `` documentary soap operas '' .
original: The second thing I don't like about these kinds of programs is that they are labeled as "documentary soap operas".

obfuscation: I believe this is an abuse of the word documentary even though it is associated with the phrase soap opera , which is a much better label for the genre .
original: I believe this is an abuse of the word documentary even though it is connected with the phrase soap opera, which is a much better label for the genre.

obfuscation: To me a documentary is a film or television program that gives facts about something real like a historic occurrence not something constructed by a production party .
original: To me a documentary is a film or television program that gives facts about something real like a historic occurrence not something constructed by a production company.

obfuscation: I would like to rename the genre ; a name like `` real life soap opera '' would be a lot better .
original: I would like to rename the genre; a name like "real life soap opera" would be much better.

obfuscation: As one might have noticed I do n't like documentary soap operas very a lot .
original: As one might have noticed I don't like documentary soap operas very much.

obfuscation: I think they are examples of regretful television entertainment , which I hope will vanish as soon as possible .
original: I think they are examples of bad television entertainment, which I hope will vanish as soon as possible.

obfuscation: I do n't remember the genre has more to give , all the ideas appears to be too similar to each other .
original: I don't think the genre has more to give, all the ideas appears to be too similar to each other.

obfuscation: If this trend continues I hope that the ones who now are watching the programs will become enlighten and realize that it is regretful television entertainment .
original: If this trend continues I hope that the ones who now are watching the programs will become enlighten and realize that it is bad television entertainment.
